hero.description: A journey filled with innovation, trust, and growth in marketplace lending.

sections.heading: About Us
content: We are an independent financial service provider, connecting people and businesses – as investors or borrowers. With us, you will find modern financing solutions, independent of traditional banks.
Our platform is fully automated, easy to use, and ensures fast, secure, and transparent processes. This allows you to benefit from efficient handling and attractive conditions.
As a licensed financial institution, we place great importance on the highest standards of compliance and integrity. Annual audits by independent auditors further strengthen your trust in our work.

sections.heading: Who We Are
content: Since our founding in 2008, we have been shaping the future of the financial world as Switzerland's first crowdlending FinTech. With pioneering spirit and innovative strength, we have set new standards, offering responsible and transparent financial solutions to both investors and borrowers.

Driven by strong values and true independence, we have had the privilege of supporting over 60,000 customers and successfully processing a loan application volume of more than CHF 2.5 billion – a success story that builds trust.

sections.heading: Why Choose Cashare
sections.description: At Cashare, we combine cutting-edge financial technology with proven Swiss reliability—offering a smarter, more transparent way to borrow and invest.
sections.content: We utilize modern technologies and data-driven analyses to address diverse financial needs. With a wide range of products, we provide tailored solutions for every investor and borrower.

sections.heading: Experience - Security Efficiency - Technology
sections.description: With innovation and responsibility, we provide cost-effective solutions for borrowers and investors. Borrower and Investors.

cards.title: What you should know about us
cards.description: Founded in 2008 as the first Swiss crowdlending platform, Cashare has established itself as a leading provider of innovative financing solutions. With over 60,000 customers and CHF 2.5 billion in verified loan applications, Cashare offers proven and secure financial solutions.

cards.title: Transparent & Efficient Processes
cards.description: Cashare stands for clear, fair, and transparent processes. Whether for borrowers or investors, all steps are structured without hidden fees or surprises.Users can make informed financial decisions thanks to real-time updates and detailed analyses.

cards.title: Flexible financial solutions for everyone
cards.description: Cashare connects borrowers with investors, offering a fair alternative to banks.Borrowers benefit from flexible terms, attractive interest rates, and quick processing, while investors gain access to appealing returns and a diversified investment strategy.

cards.title: Attractive Returns for Investors
cards.description: Investors benefit from attractive returns that optimally complement traditional investment forms in a portfolio, especially as an extension in the fixed-income sector.

cards.title: Security Through Intelligent Risk Management
cards.description: Optimize your portfolio with our customized investment solutions for institutional investors. Benefit from strong risk management and professional handling at every stage.

cards.title: Sustainable Financial Solutions
cards.description: Cashare connects borrowers and investors to form a strong financial community. Through crowdlending, financial independence is promoted, and small businesses that otherwise would not have access to fair financing opportunities are supported.
